Package hrps.entity

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • hrps.entity.Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckedInReservation, CheckedOutReservation, ConfirmedReservation, ExpiredReservation, WaitListReservation
    public abstract class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an abstraction of a reservation, including check-in/checkout time, numbers of adults/children, the guest who made the reservation and the room number wished to be booked.
    Author:
    An Ruyi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Guest guest
      The guest made this reservation.
      private int numAdult
      Number of adults registered for this reservation.
      private int numChild
      Number of children registered for this reservation.
      private java.util.UUID reservationCode
      This reservation's code, unique for each reservation.
      private java.lang.String roomNum
      Room number wished to be booked for this reservation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Reservation​(int numAdult, int numChild, Guest guest, java.lang.String roomNum)
      This is only called when we would like to instantiate a new reservation's subclass, only when we create a waiting reservation upon customers' demands.
      Reservation​(int numAdult, int numChild, Guest guest, java.util.UUID reservationCode, java.lang.String roomNum)
      This is only called when we would like to instantiate a new reservation's subclass without changing its unique reservation code.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        Reservation​(int numAdult,
            int numChild,
            Guest guest,
            java.lang.String roomNum)
        This is only called when we would like to instantiate a new reservation's subclass, only when we create a waiting reservation upon customers' demands.
        Parameters:
        numAdult - - number of adults in this reservation
        numChild - - number of children in this reservation
        guest - - guest who made this reservation
        roomNum - - room number wished to be booked for this reservation

      • Reservation

        Reservation​(int numAdult,
            int numChild,
            Guest guest,
            java.util.UUID reservationCode,
            java.lang.String roomNum)
        This is only called when we would like to instantiate a new reservation's subclass without changing its unique reservation code. For instance, when we confirm a reservation from a WaitListReservation, a ConfirmedReservation is created with the same reservation code as the WaitListReservation.
        Parameters:
        numAdult - - number of adults in this reservation
        numChild - - number of children in this reservation
        guest - - guest who made this reservation
        roomNum - - room number wished to be booked for this reservation
        reservationCode - - unique reservation code that is used to identify this reservation

      • confirm

        public abstract ConfirmedReservation confirm​(java.lang.String roomNum)
                                      throws InvalidStatusChangeException
        Confirm this reservation.
        Parameters:
        roomNum - The confirmed room number to be reserved.
        Returns:
        A ConfirmedReservation object represents this confirmed reservation.
        Throws:
        InvalidStatusChangeException - When this method is called on a Reservation object other than Pending subclass.

      • checkIn

                                      throws InvalidStatusChangeException
        Check in this reservation.
        Parameters:
        actualCheckInTime - The datetime when the guest checked in.
        Returns:
        A CheckedInReservation object represents this check-in.
        Throws:
        InvalidStatusChangeException - When this method is called on a Reservation object other than Confirmed subclass.

        Returns:
